content: Shifting to our domestic EGM installed base, we had a total of 16,027 units installed at the end of the second quarter, representing an increase of 112 units sequentially, upside resulting from our outsized growth within our premium EGM installed base, supported by the strong performance and growing customer adoption of Orion Curve Premium and the modest expansion of our Texas Class II footprint on the heels of the recent favorable Supreme Court ruling was partially offset by the impact of our continuous fleet optimization efforts.
